It seems that the neonenrgy is the key to much new technologie, so i created a module to improve my Researcher. It allows me to do more researches using this type of enrgy.
The Modul must be directly connectet to the Researcher, that means that all work is done in the Researcher as usual.
The module stores up to 10000 NE, if this notvenough for an research you can use more moduls or wait until its fills up again. The enrgy can be inserted by cales or batteries.
